data.title: LG Smart TVs logging USB filenames and viewing info to LG servers
Secret U.S. court approves wider NSA spying even after finding excesses
Wikipedia names Texas PR firm over false manipulation of site entries. Free encyclopaedia called in lawyers after 300 'sock puppet' accounts were traced to single firm.
United States paid more than $150 million to companies in Afghanistan that are accused of financing terrorist attacks on American soldiers and facilities
Monty Python to reunite for new show after 30 years
A stash of 24 gold bars worth more than $1.1m has been discovered in the toilet compartment of a commercial plane in eastern India.

Switzerland will vote on Sunday on whether to limit the salaries of top executives so they don't earn more in a month than the lowest paid workers earn in a year, a move that could mean big pay cuts for business leaders earning millions.
24,000-Year-Old Body Is Kin to Both Europeans and American Indians
Gabon troops kill poacher, arrest 34 others near elephant park. The soldiers found the carcass of an elephant and a panther at the camp used by the poachers, who had also been mining for gold.
US and UK struck secret deal to allow NSA to 'unmask' Britons' personal data
